concept.title: Napsor Settings
concept.shortdesc: Napsor is a great app for a good work-life balance. It helps you make sure that you leave the office with a fresh mind, ready to enjoy your leisure time!

dlentry.dd: Ask Napsor to wake you, in case your nap causes an unwanted level of accompanying noise that your colleagues might here.
Tell Napsor when you want to leave in the afternoon so that you do not miss your gym appointment, data, or favorite TV show.
Connect Napsor to your e-mail application and mark the contacts in your address book, whose e-mails you had better read in no time.
Capture statistics about the amount of resting time that you were able to get in a week and how often your peaceful slumber was disturbed.
Monitor your heart-rate using any equipment that is supported by your smartphone. Analyze this information together with your statistics to find out when you should go on vacation.

note.p: Use our app to avoid burn-out a long time before it can develop.

conbody.section:
Hardware Add-OnsTo make sure that you spend your well-earned mid-day rest without detection, you can purchase two great extensions:
Motion Sensor with Approximation Alarm Attach the optional motion sensor in a convenient place so that Napsor can inform you when someone approaches.
Door Opening Sensor with Approximation Alarm Connect the optional door opening sensor to your office door so that Napsor can inform you when your boss enters.
More add-ons will follow soon!
